# accdbexport #
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jkennel/accdbexport.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jkennel/accdbexport)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/jkennel/accdbexport/master.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/jkennel/accdbexport?branch=master)


This package reads a Microsoft Access database (.accdb) using Jackcess and outputs text files for each table (.csv).

# Installation #

```{r setup, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
remotes::install_github('jkennel/accdbexport')
```


It only has one function.

```{r example, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(rJava)
library(accdbexport)

accdb_to_csv(path_to_accdb, path_to_output_folder)

```
